description: SSO login button is not present on the-internet login page — this site uses form auth only
rootCause: The element #sso-login-button does not exist on this page. The-internet uses standard form authentication only — there is no SSO integration.

actions.description: Skip the SSO login attempt — this page does not support SSO

actionPlan.planSummary: Remove the SSO login step and use the standard username/password form instead

lowRiskActions.description: Skip the SSO login attempt — this page does not support SSO

description: Phantom button element does not exist on the-internet login page — test-only element
rootCause: The element 'phantom-button' does not exist on the login page. This is a test-only element — the login page only contains username, password, and login button elements.
evidenceHighlights: Element id 'phantom-button' is absent from the DOM
Login page only contains standard form authentication elements

description: Non-existent CSS submit button selector on the-internet login page
rootCause: The CSS selector '.nonexistent-submit-button' does not match any element on the login page. The submit button uses a different CSS class — check the selector in your test.
evidenceHighlights: The login form submit button has a different selector

description: Checkout submit button not present on login page — test is on wrong page context
rootCause: Element 'checkout-submit-btn' is not present on the login page. The test is attempting a checkout interaction while on the authentication page — it may need to complete login first.
evidenceHighlights: Checkout element absent from login page DOM
Test context mismatch — login page has no checkout functionality

actions.description: Capture diagnostic screenshot to document the unexpected page state
actions.rationale: Document the page state showing the mismatch between expected checkout page and actual login page

actions.description: Skip test — checkout functionality is not available on the login page
actions.rationale: The test cannot reach the checkout element from the login page without completing authentication first

actionPlan.planSummary: Capture diagnostic screenshot then skip — checkout context unavailable on login page

lowRiskActions.description: Capture diagnostic screenshot to document the unexpected page state
lowRiskActions.rationale: Document the page state showing the mismatch between expected checkout page and actual login page

mediumRiskActions.description: Skip test — checkout functionality is not available on the login page
mediumRiskActions.rationale: The test cannot reach the checkout element from the login page without completing authentication first

description: Cookie consent banner element not present on checkboxes page — site has no GDPR overlay
rootCause: The element '#cookie-consent-accept' does not exist on the checkboxes page. The-internet does not implement a cookie consent banner — no GDPR overlay is present on this site.
evidenceHighlights: No cookie consent banner in DOM
The-internet is a practice site without GDPR implementation

description: Test is on login page but expected to be on the secure page — authentication not yet complete
rootCause: The browser is on the login page but the test expected to be on the secure page. The authentication step has not been completed — the test needs to log in first.

description: Test is on the secure page but expected to be on login — authentication already completed
rootCause: The test has already navigated past the expected login step. The browser is on the secure page, which indicates authentication succeeded. The test should continue from its current position.
evidenceHighlights: Expected URL was /login — already passed that step

continueContext.continueReason: The test has already navigated past the login page to the secure destination
continueContext.observedState: Browser is on the secure page — authentication has already completed successfully
continueContext.resumeFromStepHint: Continue from the next step after the login action
continueContext.caveats: Ensure test data state is consistent with being already authenticated

description: Pattern for autonomous action execution feature validation — CAPTURE_SCREENSHOT LOW-risk plan
rootCause: The element '#autonomous-action-test-element' does not exist on this page. This pattern is used for autonomous action execution testing.

actions.description: Capture diagnostic screenshot when autonomous-action-test-element is not found
actions.rationale: Document the page state for diagnostic purposes

actionPlan.planSummary: Capture diagnostic screenshot for autonomous action test validation

lowRiskActions.description: Capture diagnostic screenshot when autonomous-action-test-element is not found
lowRiskActions.rationale: Document the page state for diagnostic purposes

description: Demo pattern -- triggers DUMMY_ACTION handler when #dummy-action-element is not found
rootCause: The element '#dummy-action-element' does not exist on the login page. This pattern demonstrates the DUMMY_ACTION custom handler.

actions.description: Execute the dummy action as a corrective response
actions.rationale: Demonstrates a custom LOW-risk handler that can be triggered from the knowledge base

lowRiskActions.description: Execute the dummy action as a corrective response
lowRiskActions.rationale: Demonstrates a custom LOW-risk handler that can be triggered from the knowledge base

rootCause: Element '#direct-add-sentinel-test' does not exist on this page.
Element '#direct-reuse-sentinel-test' does not exist on this page.
